reviewText: I like may have bought the complete collections of mike hammer peter gunn etc which are showcased her but sadly the Ray Milland series Markham has not as yet seen the light of day. Considering that Milland is the biggest hollywood name of the pack that does surprise me. Bein an avid collector of these wonderful shows of yesteryear I would snatch it up tomorrow if it were released. These compilationsare a great taster for what is out there BUT be warned like me you may get infected and become a fanatical collector as I did several years ago.yep they really are that good. Mini film noirs in some cases. Be warned
